about_the_game:
Wishful Journey:Love Across Time is a live action interactive game. You will play the role of a migrant worker who makes wishes to travel back to ancient times and meet various ancient beauties, creating interactive storylines. Any choice you make in the game will trigger different storylines and endings. Enhance your heart rate with beautiful women, search for clues in the game, and bring them all back to modern times.

  • Qi Yanting
Female officer in charge of the Western Regions Peacemaking Group
Calm self-possessed, decisive and Inscrutable She has a strong aura who is the supervisor of the Western Regions Mission and the Royal Concubine's Palace. She follows the Western Regions Concubine's team into the imperial city. However, she is a descendant of a Han caravan and was bribed by the second prince to serve as an internal agent later. Her wish is to bring her family back to her hometown.
Qi Yanting is the male protagonist’s female boss in the ancient workplace. She is a cool and charming lady who also has the temperament of an SM queen. She is keeping test with the male protagonist before each other's identity exposed. She will always protect the male protagonist at critical moments, and give him appropriate "punishment" when he shows obvious flaws.. It is an important help in the final treasure stealing plot line.

  • Princess Xin'an
Princess Daluan
Unruly and willful yet naive and charming, she is a tsundere sweet girl without any scheming.
favored by the emperor deeply, as the prince's sibling sister, she seems to enjoy infinite honor, and in fact she is a puppet imprisoned in the imperial city. Faced with the fate of being married off, the princess becomes more and more misbehaving. After being caught by the male protagonist and trying to leave the palace in disguise, the two strangers become happy enemies gradually. The male protagonist also relied on the princess's protection to avoid Eunuch Zhang, who was suspicious of his identity and had been trying to kill him. She was the male protagonist's talisman.

  • Rakshasa girl
Female assassin
Orphan girl, a female assassin sent by Xiliang, was trained as a killer since she was a child. Although she first appeared in men's clothing, she is tall and slim, has a free and straightforward personality, and is a toned, agile and athletic beauty.
With superb martial arts skills, he was rescued by the male protagonist and hid in the squad room after the assassination mission failed. As long as you gain her trust, you can get the strongest military assistance. Because her existence is often hidden from the eyes and ears of others, the two of them inevitably come into physical contact while hiding. The seemingly frank contact always makes the male protagonist think about it, but he himself is completely unaware of it.

  • Xiaoyuan
Maid
A little white rabbit with a cute and cute personality, but timid and weak due to being often bullied, and able to inspire people's desire to protect.
After being rescued by the male protagonist, he will treat him with all his heart and take care of his food and daily life in every possible way. Xiaoyuan is also an important connector connecting other characters. Xiaoyuan's true identity is the missing daughter of the cold palace empress, and she helps the two agree to obtain important evidence to bring down the second prince.

  • The honour of mysterious caves
A charming mature woman who looks charming but has a vicious mind
Xuanji real person Mysterious Viewer A charming mature woman who looks charming but has a vicious mind. Although she considers herself a member of the Taoist sect, her reputation for seducing the king in her lewd palace is rumored all over the world. Because she manipulated the emperor and then took over the power of the harem, her vicious methods were feared by everyone. Even the princes and princesses were afraid of her. When she heard that the saint from the Western Regions was bringing treasures to the palace, she began to covet them. The male protagonist is framed by Eunuch Zhang and goes to Xuanji Temple to get the medicine. If he chooses incorrectly, he will be trained into a puppet by the demon. But there is also a chance to reveal her secret of controlling the emperor and make great achievements.

  • Sun Wanru
Manager of the Royal Dining Room On the surface
she appears to be a gentle sister with excellent cooking skills and understanding. In fact, she is deeply introverted, very defensive, protective, and a bit sinister. Act decisively. He takes great care of Xiaoyuan and loves the male protagonist very much. He is one of the few people the male protagonist can confide in without any scruples.

  • Princess Lanna
Saint of the Western Regions
Princess Lanna Saint of the Western Regions The princess of the Western Regions is also the legendary most beautiful woman in the Western Regions. She has always covered her face with a veil and never showed her true face. She is a mysterious beauty with an exotic style. She is Xiaoyuan's half-sister, and she came to the Central Plains with the mission of finding her. Being the only person who knew that holy objects had the ability to travel through time gave her the confidence to escape from the palace at any time.

  • Imperial concubine of the cold palace
Empress of the cold palace
A lonely, sad and noble beauty, she was once the most favored concubine in the harem. She had an affair with a visiting prince from the Western Regions and secretly gave birth to her daughter Xiaoyuan. Later, he was stolen and threatened by someone who wanted to do it. After that, he was often in a trance and was diagnosed as insane and imprisoned. However, Xiaoyuan was still raised as an abandoned baby in the palace. The male protagonist can get this secret from Eunuch Zhang before his death and help the mother and daughter recognize each other. Through this, he can obtain the letters of the second prince's collaboration with the enemy and the country, and get rid of control.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 or AMD HD 7950 with 3GB VRAM minimum (Support of Vulkan 1.1 required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent或以上

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 with 4GB VRAM minimum (Support of Vulkan 1.1 required)

short_description: Xu yuan, who was a loser in real life traveled to an ancient palace. By transforming into the male protagonist, players will be in love with many beauties with different personalities, such as the unruly princess, the cold female assassin, embark on a love adventure that spans time and space.
